title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
description: Learn to play this classic melody phrase by phrase.

steps.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
steps.description: This beloved melody uses only 6 notes from the C major scale. We'll learn it phrase by phrase. The key is C major, and we start on middle C (MIDI 60).

steps.title: Phrase 1: "Twinkle twinkle"
steps.description: Play: C C G G A A G. This is the opening phrase.
steps.hint: Start on middle C, then jump up to G.

steps.title: Phrase 2: "Little star"
steps.description: Play: A A G. Hold G a bit longer.
steps.hint: A is two notes above G.

steps.title: Phrase 3: "How I wonder"
steps.description: Play: F F E E D D C.
steps.hint: This phrase walks down the scale: F, E, D, C.

steps.title: Middle Section: "Up above"
steps.description: Play: G G F F E E D.
steps.hint: Another descending line, starting from G.

steps.title: Accompany: C Major Chord
steps.description: Now try the C major chord that accompanies the melody.
steps.hint: Play C, E, and G together (60, 64, 67).

steps.title: Accompany: F Major Chord
steps.description: The 'how I wonder' section uses an F chord.
steps.hint: Play F, A, and C together (65, 69, 72).

steps.title: Accompany: G Major Chord
steps.description: The G chord brings us back to C in the melody.
steps.hint: Play G, B, and D together (67, 71, 74).

steps.title: You Learned Twinkle Twinkle!
steps.description: Great job! You've learned the melody and three chords (C, F, G) that make up this song. These three chords — the I, IV, and V — are the foundation of countless songs. Try playing the full melody from memory!

steps.title: Song Quiz
steps.description: What three chords did we use to accompany Twinkle Twinkle?
